source_reference.text: Is Marriage Hard? Let's Talk Toxic Marriage Advice #christianmarriage #shorts #evangelical (Video by SheilaWrayGregoire)

content_summary:
So often we hear "marriage is hard." And it's usually accompanied by other teachings in evangelical marriage culture that causes people to gaslight themselves and ignore their issues.

We need to stop teaching marriage is hard, and instead teach good conflict resolution techniques and what great marriages need!

That's what we do in our new book The Marriage You Want, available for pre-order!
https://baremarriage.com/the-marriage...
